page.title: 05Forest Dialect
page.content:
Thoughout the years a language has developed in the forest, we still use some of it now. Here is a conversation in 'Forest'.
{"How bist yer old butt?" said Bert. {"I bent very well I hit me yud on a {stwun," said Alf. {"Yer bist a right muntle, how duw do {it?" said Bert. {"I was chasing me ship, me vit slipped {into a dipple. It did'nt half give me {some jip. I was wum for a wik with a {bad yud "
This tells of a man who banged his head on a stone while he was chasing his sheep. His feet slipped into a steep sided pit. It gave him so much pain he stayed home for a week.
